name: Veeam
description:
Veeam Availability for Nutanix AHV provides Availability for all applications and AHV VMs running on Nutanix. It contains a virtual proxy appliance that’s deployed on an AHV cluster to back up and restore VMs to Nutanix AHV clusters. A Veeam Backup & Replication™ server must be deployed, so the proxy may access Veeam backup repository for AHV backups. The Veeam Backup & Replication server enables VM disk, file-level and application-item restores for mission-critical applications and Direct Restore to Microsoft Azure.
#### License:
* [30-day FREE trial](https://www.veeam.com/availability-nutanix-ahv-download.html)
#### Hardware Requirement:
* CPU: x86-64 processors. 4 CPU cores plus 1 CPU core for each additional concurrent task
* Memory: 4 GB RAM plus 1 GB RAM for each additional concurrent task.
#### Platform:
* Nutanix AOS 5.1.1.1
* 2017.07.20 for Community Edition
#### Support Information:
* Website:[Veeam Support](https://www.veeam.com/support.html)
#### Other Instructions:
* Open ports `8100`,`9440`,`10006`,`3260`,`2500-5000`
author: Nutanix
